sen.j: 羽林家（うりんけ）は、鎌倉時代以降の公家の家格のひとつで、摂家、清華家、大臣家の下、名家 (公家)と同列、半家 (公家)の上の序列に位置する。
sen.e: The House of Urin is one of the house status of Kuge after the Kamakura period, and is inferior to Sekke (the House of regent), the House of Seiga, and the house of minister, equal to meike (kuge), kuge of lower rank, and superior to hange (kuge), kuge of lower rank.

The House of Urin was one of the house status of kuge subsequent to the Kamakura period; it was inferior to Sekke (the house of regent), the House of Seiga and the house of minister, but it was equal to meike (kuge), a kuge of lower rank, and superior to hange (kuge), a kuge of lower rank.

The Urin Family was of the house status of kuge (court nobility) subsequent to the Kamakura period; it was inferior to the sekke (the house of regents), Seigake (one of the statuses of court nobility that was inferior to the sekke but superior to the minister) and the house of minister, but it was equal to meike (kuge), a kuge of lower rank, and superior to hange (kuge), a kuge of lower rank.
sen.cmt: 公家の後にcourt nobility、清華家の後に(one of the statuses of court nobility which is inferiror to Sekke but superior to minister)と説明を追加しました。"House of～" -> "～Family" に変更しました。

sen.j: 近衛府少将・中将を兼ね、参議から中納言、最高は大納言まで進むことができる武官の家柄。
sen.e: The House of Urin is in the standing of the house of military officer, which can also serve as Konoefu Shosho, Chujo and can be promoted from Sangi (councillor) through Chunagon (associate chief of the councillor of state) up to Dainagon (chief of the councillor of state).

The House of Urin had the standing of the house of military officers, which could also serve as konoefu shosho (chujo) and could be promoted from sangi (councilor) through chunagon (associate chief of the councilor of state) up to dainagon (chief of the councilor of state).

The Urin Family had the standing of the house of military officers, which could also serve as konoefu shosho (chujo) and could be promoted from sangi (councilor) through Chunagon (vice-councilor of state) up to Dainagon (chief councilor of state).
sen.cmt: "House of～" -> "～Family" に変更しました。"chunagon (associate chief of the councilor of state) " -> "Chunagon (vice-councilor of state)"、"dainagon (chief of the councilor of state)" -> "Dainagon (chief councilor of state)" に変更しました。

sen.j: 極稀ではあるが、内大臣まで昇進する者もいた。
sen.e: Although extremely rare, there was a case wherein the family member was promoted to lord keeper of the privy.
Although extremely rare, there was a case in which the family member was promoted to lord keeper of the privy.
Although extremely rare, there were cases in which a family member was promoted to naidaijin (minister of the center).
sen.cmt: 内大臣を naidaijin (minister of the center)としました。

sen.j: 明治維新後の華族令では原則伯爵に叙せられた（ただし、右大臣岩倉具視の子孫である岩倉家は特に公爵を授けられた）。
sen.e: According to the ordiance on nobles after the Meiji Restoration, the House of Urin was ranked in principle as Count (however, Iwakura Family, the descendant of Tomomi IWAKURA, Minister of the Right, was specially offered Prince).

According to the ordinance on nobles after the Meiji Restoration, the House of Urin was ranked in principle as a count (but the Iwakura Family, the descendant of Minister of the Right Tomomi IWAKURA, was specially offered the title of a prince).

sen.j: 羽林とは『羽の如く速く、林の如く多い』という意で、中国では北辰（北斗星）を守護する星の名称。
sen.e: Urin means "fast as a feather and many as a forest" and is a name for a star that guards Hokushin (the North Star) in China.
Urin means "fast as a feather and many as a forest" and was a name for a star that guarded Hokushin (the North Star) in China.
